channel.title: How do you fix the allstar trade dupe
channel.description: Please can someone please tell me how to fix this trade dupe :(

item.title: How do you fix the allstar trade dupe
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Which dupe is it? The one where you press the interfaces really quickly? If so add a delay or a fail-safe system so that if the trade is ‘ambiguous’ then the trade is not completed. You should perhaps try handling it in a static context, so two different ‘unsynchronized’ ‘Clients’ cannot accept the trade at the same time (since one will be received first).

Read full topic
item.source: How do you fix the allstar trade dupe
